items.title: Abhaneri
items.summary: Just off the Jaipur-Agra highway is the village of Abhaneri. Here you will see the ruins of the 10th-century Harshat Mata Temple, with interesting stone carvings, and the impressive Chand Baoli Step Well.

items.title: Ajmer
items.summary: At the heart of predominantly Hindu Rajasthan is the Muslim city of Ajmer. This busy city is most famous for the shrine of the Sufi saint Mu’inuddin Chishti who was instrumental in spreading Islam throughout northern India in the 12th century.
